00020 static int ocinitialized = 0;
00021 
00022 /**************************************************/
00023 /* Track legal ids */
00024 
00025 #define ocverify(o) ((o) != NULL && (((OCheader*)(o))->magic == OCMAGIC)?1:0)
00026 
00027 #define ocverifyclass(o,cl) ((o) != NULL && (((OCheader*)(o))->occlass == cl)?1:0)
00028 
00029 #define OCVERIFYX(k,x,r) if(!ocverify(x)||!ocverifyclass(x,k)) {return (r);}
00030 #define OCVERIFY(k,x) OCVERIFYX(k,x,OCTHROW(OC_EINVAL))
00031 
00032 #define OCDEREF(T,s,x) (s)=(T)(x)
00033 
00034 /**************************************************/
00035 
00036 static int
00037 oc_initialize(void)
00038 {
00039     int status = OC_NOERR;
00040     status = ocinternalinitialize();
00041     ocinitialized = 1;
00042     return status;
00043 }
00044 
00045 
00046 /**************************************************/
00066 OCerror
00067 oc_open(const char* url, OCobject* linkp)
00068 {
00069     OCerror ocerr;
00070     OCstate* state;
00071     if(!ocinitialized) oc_initialize();
00072     ocerr = ocopen(&state,url);
00073     if(ocerr == OC_NOERR && linkp) {
00074     *linkp = (OCobject)(state);
00075     }
00076     return ocerr;
00077 }
00078 
00089 OCerror
00090 oc_close(OCobject link)
00091 {
00092     OCstate* state;
00093     OCVERIFY(OC_State,link);
00094     OCDEREF(OCstate*,state,link);
00095     occlose(state);
00096     return OC_NOERR;
00097 }

00126 OCerror
00127 oc_fetch(OCobject link, const char* constraint,
00128                  OCdxd dxdkind, OCflags flags, OCobject* rootp)
00129 {
00130     OCstate* state;
00131     OCerror ocerr = OC_NOERR;
00132     OCnode* root;
00133     OCVERIFY(OC_State,link);
00134     OCDEREF(OCstate*,state,link);
00135 
00136     ocerr = ocfetch(state,constraint,dxdkind,flags,&root);
00137     if(ocerr) return ocerr;
00138 
00139     if(rootp) *rootp = (OCobject)(root);
00140     return ocerr;
00141 }

00158 OCerror
00159 oc_root_free(OCobject link, OCobject ddsroot)
00160 {
00161     OCnode* root;
00162     OCVERIFY(OC_Node,ddsroot);
00163     OCDEREF(OCnode*,root,ddsroot);
00164 
00165     ocroot_free(root);
00166     return OC_NOERR;
00167 }
00168 
00180 const char*
00181 oc_tree_text(OCobject link, OCobject ddsroot)
00182 {
00183     OCnode* root = NULL;
00184     OCVERIFYX(OC_Node,ddsroot,NULL);
00185     OCDEREF(OCnode*,root,ddsroot);
00186 
00187     if(root == NULL) return NULL;
00188     root = root->root;
00189     if(root->tree == NULL) return NULL;
00190     return root->tree->text;
00191 }

00228 OCerror
00229 oc_dds_properties(OCobject link,
00230       OCobject ddsnode,
00231       char** namep,
00232       OCtype* octypep,
00233       OCtype* atomtypep, /* if objecttype == OC_Atomic */
00234       OCobject* containerp,
00235       size_t* rankp,
00236       size_t* nsubnodesp,
00237       size_t* nattrp)
00238 {
00239     OCnode* node;
00240     OCVERIFY(OC_Node,ddsnode);
00241     OCDEREF(OCnode*,node,ddsnode);
00242 
00243     if(namep) *namep = nulldup(node->name);
00244     if(octypep) *octypep = node->octype;
00245     if(atomtypep) *atomtypep = node->etype;
00246     if(rankp) *rankp = node->array.rank;
00247     if(containerp) *containerp = (OCobject)node->container;    
00248     if(nsubnodesp) *nsubnodesp = oclistlength(node->subnodes);
00249     if(nattrp) {
00250         if(node->octype == OC_Attribute) {
00251             *nattrp = oclistlength(node->att.values);
00252         } else {
00253             *nattrp = oclistlength(node->attributes);
00254     }
00255     }
00256     return OC_NOERR;
00257 }
00258 
00271 OCerror
00272 oc_dds_name(OCobject link, OCobject ddsnode, char** namep)
00273 {
00274     OCstate* state;
00275     OCnode* node;
00276     OCVERIFY(OC_State,link);
00277     OCDEREF(OCstate*,state,link);
00278     OCVERIFY(OC_Node,ddsnode);
00279     OCDEREF(OCnode*,node,ddsnode);
00280 
00281     if(state == NULL || node == NULL) return OCTHROW(OC_EINVAL);
00282     if(namep) *namep = nulldup(node->name);
00283     return OC_NOERR;
00284 }

00457 OCerror
00458 oc_dds_ithfield(OCobject link, OCobject ddsnode, size_t index, OCobject* fieldnodep)
00459 {
00460     OCnode* node;
00461     OCnode* field;
00462     OCVERIFY(OC_Node,ddsnode);
00463     OCDEREF(OCnode*,node,ddsnode);
00464 
00465     if(!iscontainer(node->octype))
00466     return OC_EBADTYPE;
00467 
00468     if(index >= oclistlength(node->subnodes))
00469     return OC_EINDEX;
00470 
00471     field = (OCnode*)oclistget(node->subnodes,index);
00472     if(fieldnodep) *fieldnodep = (OCobject)field;
00473     return OC_NOERR;
00474 }
00475 
00490 OCerror
00491 oc_dds_ithsubnode(OCobject link, OCobject ddsnode, size_t index, OCobject* fieldnodep)
00492 {
00493     return oc_dds_ithfield(link,ddsnode,index,fieldnodep);
00494 }

00509 oc_dds_gridarray(OCobject link, OCobject grid, OCobject* arraynodep)

00511     return oc_dds_ithfield(link,grid,0,arraynodep);
00512 }

00529 OCerror
00530 oc_dds_gridmap(OCobject link, OCobject grid, size_t index, OCobject* mapnodep)
00531 {
00532     return oc_dds_ithfield(link,grid,index+1,mapnodep);
00533 }

00535 
00549 OCerror
00550 oc_dds_fieldbyname(OCobject link, OCobject ddsnode, const char* name, OCobject* fieldp)
00551 {
00552     OCerror err = OC_NOERR;
00553     OCnode* node;
00554     size_t count,i;
00555     OCVERIFY(OC_Node,ddsnode);
00556     OCDEREF(OCnode*,node,ddsnode);
00557 
00558     if(!iscontainer(node->octype))
00559     return OC_EBADTYPE;
00560 
00561     /* Search the fields to find a name match */
00562     err = oc_dds_nsubnodes(link,ddsnode,&count);
00563     if(err != OC_NOERR) return err;
00564     for(i=0;i<count;i++) {
00565     OCobject field;
00566     char* fieldname = NULL;
00567     int match = 1;
00568 
00569         err = oc_dds_ithfield(link,ddsnode,i,&field);
00570         if(err != OC_NOERR) return err;
00571     // Get the field's name
00572         err = oc_dds_name(link,field,&fieldname);
00573         if(err != OC_NOERR) return err;
00574     if(fieldname != NULL) {
00575         match = strcmp(name,fieldname);
00576         free(fieldname);
00577     }
00578     if(match == 0) {
00579         if(fieldp) *fieldp = field;
00580         return OC_NOERR;
00581     }
00582     }
00583     return OC_EINDEX; /* name was not found */
00584 }
00585 
00599 OCerror
00600 oc_dds_dimensions(OCobject link, OCobject ddsnode, OCobject* dims)
00601 {
00602     OCnode* node;
00603     size_t i;
00604 
00605     OCVERIFY(OC_Node,ddsnode);
00606     OCDEREF(OCnode*,node,ddsnode);
00607 
00608     if(node->array.rank == 0) return OCTHROW(OC_ESCALAR);
00609     if(dims != NULL) {
00610         for(i=0;i<node->array.rank;i++) {
00611             OCnode* dim = (OCnode*)oclistget(node->array.dimensions,i);
00612         dims[i] = (OCobject)dim;
00613     }   
00614     }
00615     return OC_NOERR;
00616 }
00617 
00632 OCerror
00633 oc_dds_ithdimension(OCobject link, OCobject ddsnode, size_t index, OCobject* dimidp)
00634 {
00635     OCnode* node;
00636     OCobject dimid = NULL;
00637     OCVERIFY(OC_Node,ddsnode);
00638     OCDEREF(OCnode*,node,ddsnode);
00639 
00640     if(node->array.rank == 0) return OCTHROW(OC_ESCALAR);
00641     if(index >= node->array.rank) return OCTHROW(OC_EINDEX);
00642     dimid = (OCobject)oclistget(node->array.dimensions,index);
00643     if(dimidp) *dimidp = dimid;
00644     return OC_NOERR;
00645 }
00646 
00662 OCerror
00663 oc_dimension_properties(OCobject link, OCobject ddsnode, size_t* sizep, char** namep)
00664 {
00665     OCnode* dim;
00666     OCVERIFY(OC_Node,ddsnode);
00667     OCDEREF(OCnode*,dim,ddsnode);
00668 
00669     if(dim->octype != OC_Dimension) return OCTHROW(OC_EBADTYPE);
00670     if(sizep) *sizep = dim->dim.declsize;
00671     if(namep) *namep = nulldup(dim->name);
00672     return OC_NOERR;
00673 }
00674 
00690 OCerror
00691 oc_dds_dimensionsizes(OCobject link, OCobject ddsnode, size_t* dimsizes)
00692 {
00693     OCnode* node;
00694     OCVERIFY(OC_Node,ddsnode);
00695     OCDEREF(OCnode*,node,ddsnode);
00696 
00697     if(node->array.rank == 0) return OCTHROW(OC_ESCALAR);
00698     if(dimsizes != NULL) {
00699     int i;
00700         for(i=0;i<node->array.rank;i++) {
00701             OCnode* dim = (OCnode*)oclistget(node->array.dimensions,i);
00702         dimsizes[i] = dim->dim.declsize;
00703     }   
00704     }
00705     return OC_NOERR;
00706 }
00707 
00735 OCerror
00736 oc_dds_attr(OCobject link, OCobject ddsnode, size_t index,
00737                char** namep, OCtype* octypep,
00738                size_t* nvaluesp, char** strings)
00739 {
00740     int i;
00741     OCnode* node;
00742     OCattribute* attr;
00743     size_t nattrs;
00744     OCVERIFY(OC_Node,ddsnode);
00745     OCDEREF(OCnode*,node,ddsnode);
00746 
00747     nattrs = oclistlength(node->attributes);
00748     if(index >= nattrs) return OCTHROW(OC_EINDEX);
00749     attr = (OCattribute*)oclistget(node->attributes,index);
00750     if(namep) *namep = strdup(attr->name);
00751     if(octypep) *octypep = attr->etype;
00752     if(nvaluesp) *nvaluesp = attr->nvalues;
00753     if(strings) {
00754     if(attr->nvalues > 0) {
00755         for(i=0;i<attr->nvalues;i++)
00756             strings[i] = nulldup(attr->values[i]);
00757     }
00758     }
00759     return OC_NOERR;    
00760 }
00761 
00770 void
00771 oc_reclaim_strings(size_t n, char** svec)
00772 {
00773     int i;
00774     for(i=0;i<n;i++) if(svec[i] != NULL) free(svec[i]);
00775 }

00790 OCerror
00791 oc_das_attr_count(OCobject link, OCobject dasnode, size_t* nvaluesp)
00792 {
00793     OCnode* attr;
00794     OCVERIFY(OC_Node,dasnode);
00795     OCDEREF(OCnode*,attr,dasnode);
00796     if(attr->octype != OC_Attribute) return OCTHROW(OC_EBADTYPE);
00797     if(nvaluesp) *nvaluesp = oclistlength(attr->att.values);
00798     return OC_NOERR;
00799 }
00800 
00823 OCerror
00824 oc_das_attr(OCobject link, OCobject dasnode, size_t index, OCtype* atomtypep, char** valuep)
00825 {
00826     OCnode* attr;
00827     size_t nvalues;
00828     OCVERIFY(OC_Node,dasnode);
00829     OCDEREF(OCnode*,attr,dasnode);
00830 
00831     if(attr->octype != OC_Attribute) return OCTHROW(OC_EBADTYPE);
00832     nvalues = oclistlength(attr->att.values);
00833     if(index >= nvalues) return OCTHROW(OC_EINDEX);
00834     if(atomtypep) *atomtypep = attr->etype;
00835     if(valuep) *valuep = nulldup((char*)oclistget(attr->att.values,index));
00836     return OC_NOERR;
00837 }

00841 /**************************************************/
00861 OCerror
00862 oc_merge_das(OCobject link, OCobject dasroot, OCobject ddsroot)
00863 {
00864     OCstate* state;
00865     OCnode* das;
00866     OCnode* dds;
00867     OCVERIFY(OC_State,link);
00868     OCDEREF(OCstate*,state,link);
00869     OCVERIFY(OC_Node,dasroot);
00870     OCDEREF(OCnode*,das,dasroot);
00871     OCVERIFY(OC_Node,ddsroot);
00872     OCDEREF(OCnode*,dds,ddsroot);
00873 
00874     return ocddsdasmerge(state,das,dds);
00875 }

00897 OCerror
00898 oc_dds_getdataroot(OCobject link, OCobject ddsroot, OCobject* datarootp)
00899 {
00900     OCerror ocerr = OC_NOERR;
00901     OCstate* state;
00902     OCnode* root;
00903     OCdata* droot;
00904     OCVERIFY(OC_State,link);
00905     OCDEREF(OCstate*,state,link);
00906     OCVERIFY(OC_Node,ddsroot);
00907     OCDEREF(OCnode*,root,ddsroot);
00908 
00909     if(datarootp == NULL)
00910     return OCTHROW(OC_EINVAL);
00911     ocerr = ocdata_getroot(state,root,&droot);
00912     if(ocerr == OC_NOERR && datarootp)
00913     *datarootp = (OCobject)droot;
00914     return ocerr;
00915 }

00932 OCerror
00933 oc_data_ithfield(OCobject link, OCobject datanode, size_t index, OCobject* fieldp)
00934 {
00935     OCerror ocerr = OC_NOERR;
00936     OCstate* state;
00937     OCdata* data;
00938     OCdata* field;
00939     OCVERIFY(OC_State,link);
00940     OCDEREF(OCstate*,state,link);
00941     OCVERIFY(OC_Data,datanode);
00942     OCDEREF(OCdata*,data,datanode);
00943 
00944     if(fieldp == NULL) return OCTHROW(OC_EINVAL);
00945     ocerr = ocdata_ithfield(state,data,index,&field);
00946     if(ocerr == OC_NOERR)
00947     *fieldp = (OCobject)field;
00948     return ocerr;
00949 }
00950 
00965 OCerror
00966 oc_data_fieldbyname(OCobject link, OCobject datanode, const char* name, OCobject* fieldp)
00967 {
00968     OCerror err = OC_NOERR;
00969     size_t count,i;
00970     OCobject ddsnode;
00971     OCVERIFY(OC_State,link);
00972     OCVERIFY(OC_Data,datanode);
00973 
00974     /* Get the dds node for this datanode */
00975     err = oc_data_ddsnode(link,datanode,&ddsnode);
00976     if(err != OC_NOERR) return err;
00977 
00978     /* Search the fields to find a name match */
00979     err = oc_dds_nsubnodes(link,ddsnode,&count);
00980     if(err != OC_NOERR) return err;
00981     for(i=0;i<count;i++) {
00982     int match;
00983     OCobject field;
00984     char* fieldname = NULL;
00985         err = oc_dds_ithfield(link,ddsnode,i,&field);
00986         if(err != OC_NOERR) return err;
00987     // Get the field's name
00988         err = oc_dds_name(link,field,&fieldname);
00989         if(err != OC_NOERR) return err;
00990     match = strcmp(name,fieldname);
00991     if(fieldname != NULL) free(fieldname);
00992     if(match == 0) {
00993         /* Get the ith datasubnode */
00994         err = oc_data_ithfield(link,datanode,i,&field);
00995             if(err != OC_NOERR) return err; 
00996         if(fieldp) *fieldp = field;
00997         return OC_NOERR;
00998     }
00999     }
01000     return OC_EINDEX; /* name was not found */
01001 }

01057 OCerror
01058 oc_data_container(OCobject link,  OCobject datanode, OCobject* containerp)
01059 {
01060     OCerror ocerr = OC_NOERR;
01061     OCstate* state;
01062     OCdata* data;
01063     OCdata* container;
01064     OCVERIFY(OC_State,link);
01065     OCDEREF(OCstate*,state,link);
01066     OCVERIFY(OC_Data,datanode);
01067     OCDEREF(OCdata*,data,datanode);
01068 
01069     if(containerp == NULL) return OCTHROW(OC_EINVAL);
01070     ocerr = ocdata_container(state,data,&container);
01071     if(ocerr == OC_NOERR)
01072     *containerp = (OCobject)container;
01073     return ocerr;
01074 }

01126 OCerror
01127 oc_data_ithelement(OCobject link, OCobject datanode, size_t* indices, OCobject* elementp)
01128 {
01129     OCerror ocerr = OC_NOERR;
01130     OCstate* state;
01131     OCdata* data;
01132     OCdata* element;
01133     OCVERIFY(OC_State,link);
01134     OCDEREF(OCstate*,state,link);
01135     OCVERIFY(OC_Data,datanode);
01136     OCDEREF(OCdata*,data,datanode);
01137 
01138     if(indices == NULL || elementp == NULL) return OCTHROW(OC_EINVAL);
01139     ocerr = ocdata_ithelement(state,data,indices,&element);
01140     if(ocerr == OC_NOERR)
01141     *elementp = (OCobject)element;
01142     return ocerr;
01143 }

01161 extern OCerror oc_data_ithrecord(OCobject link, OCobject datanode, size_t index, OCobject* recordp)
01162 {
01163     OCerror ocerr = OC_NOERR;
01164     OCstate* state;
01165     OCdata* data;
01166     OCdata* record;
01167     OCVERIFY(OC_State,link);
01168     OCDEREF(OCstate*,state,link);
01169     OCVERIFY(OC_Data,datanode);
01170     OCDEREF(OCdata*,data,datanode);
01171 
01172     if(recordp == NULL) return OCTHROW(OC_EINVAL);
01173     ocerr = ocdata_ithrecord(state,data,index,&record);
01174     if(ocerr == OC_NOERR)
01175     *recordp = (OCobject)record;
01176     return ocerr;

01197 OCerror
01198 oc_data_position(OCobject link, OCobject datanode, size_t* indices)
01199 {
01200     OCstate* state;
01201     OCdata* data;
01202     OCVERIFY(OC_State,link);
01203     OCDEREF(OCstate*,state,link);
01204     OCVERIFY(OC_Data,datanode);
01205     OCDEREF(OCdata*,data,datanode);
01206     if(indices == NULL) return OCTHROW(OC_EINVAL);
01207     return ocdata_position(state,data,indices);
01208 }

01228 OCerror
01229 oc_data_recordcount(OCobject link, OCobject datanode, size_t* countp)
01230 {
01231     OCstate* state;
01232     OCdata* data;
01233     OCVERIFY(OC_State,link);
01234     OCDEREF(OCstate*,state,link);
01235     OCVERIFY(OC_Data,datanode);
01236     OCDEREF(OCdata*,data,datanode);
01237     if(countp == NULL) return OCTHROW(OC_EINVAL);
01238     return ocdata_recordcount(state,data,countp);
01239 }

01253 OCerror
01254 oc_data_ddsnode(OCobject link, OCobject datanode, OCobject* nodep)
01255 {
01256     OCerror ocerr = OC_NOERR;
01257     OCdata* data;
01258     OCVERIFY(OC_Data,datanode);
01259     OCDEREF(OCdata*,data,datanode);
01260 
01261     OCASSERT(data->template != NULL);
01262     if(nodep == NULL) ocerr = OC_EINVAL;
01263     else *nodep = (OCobject)data->template;
01264     return ocerr;
01265 }

01308 int
01309 oc_data_indexable(OCobject link, OCobject datanode)
01310 {
01311     OCdata* data;
01312     OCVERIFY(OC_Data,datanode);
01313     OCDEREF(OCdata*,data,datanode);
01314 
01315     return (fisset(data->datamode,OCDT_ARRAY)
01316         || fisset(data->datamode,OCDT_SEQUENCE)) ? 1 : 0;
01317 }

01332 int
01333 oc_data_indexed(OCobject link, OCobject datanode)
01334 {

01338 
01339     return (fisset(data->datamode,OCDT_ELEMENT)
01340         || fisset(data->datamode,OCDT_RECORD)) ? 1 : 0;

01343 /**************************************************/
01344 
01376 OCerror
01377 oc_data_read(OCobject link, OCobject datanode,
01378                  size_t* start, size_t* edges,
01379              size_t memsize, void* memory)
01380 {
01381     OCdata* data;
01382     OCnode* template;
01383     size_t count, rank;
01384 
01385     OCVERIFY(OC_Data,datanode);
01386     OCDEREF(OCdata*,data,datanode);
01387 
01388     if(start == NULL && edges == NULL) /* Assume it is a scalar read */
01389         return oc_data_readn(link,datanode,start,0,memsize,memory);
01390  
01391     if(edges == NULL)
01392     return OCTHROW(OC_EINVALCOORDS);
01393 
01394     /* Convert edges to a count */
01395     template = data->template;
01396     rank = template->array.rank;
01397     count = octotaldimsize(rank,edges);
01398 
01399     return oc_data_readn(link,datanode,start,count,memsize,memory);
01400 }
01401 
01402 
01426 OCerror
01427 oc_data_readscalar(OCobject link, OCobject datanode,
01428              size_t memsize, void* memory)
01429 {
01430     return oc_data_readn(link,datanode,NULL,0,memsize,memory);
01431 }
01432 
01460 OCerror
01461 oc_data_readn(OCobject link, OCobject datanode,
01462                  size_t* start, size_t N,
01463              size_t memsize, void* memory)
01464 {
01465     OCerror ocerr = OC_NOERR;
01466     OCstate* state;
01467     OCdata* data;
01468     OCnode* template;
01469     size_t rank,startpoint;
01470 
01471     OCVERIFY(OC_State,link);
01472     OCDEREF(OCstate*,state,link);
01473     OCVERIFY(OC_Data,datanode);
01474     OCDEREF(OCdata*,data,datanode);
01475     
01476     /* Do argument validation */
01477 
01478     if(memory == NULL || memsize == 0)
01479     return OC_EINVAL;
01480 
01481     template = data->template;
01482     rank = template->array.rank;
01483 
01484     if(rank == 0) {
01485     startpoint = 0;
01486     N = 1;
01487     } else if(start == NULL) {
01488         return OCTHROW(OC_EINVALCOORDS);
01489     } else {/* not scalar */
01490     startpoint = ocarrayoffset(rank,template->array.sizes,start);
01491     }
01492     if(N > 0)
01493         ocerr = ocdata_read(state,data,startpoint,N,memory,memsize);
01494     if(ocerr == OC_EDATADDS)
01495     ocdataddsmsg(state,template->tree);
01496     return OCTHROW(ocerr);
01497 }
01498 
01499 
01500 
01531 OCerror
01532 oc_dds_read(OCobject link, OCobject ddsnode,
01533                  size_t* start, size_t* edges,
01534              size_t memsize, void* memory)
01535 {
01536     OCdata* data;
01537     OCnode* dds;
01538 
01539     OCVERIFY(OC_Node,ddsnode);
01540     OCDEREF(OCnode*,dds,ddsnode);
01541 
01542     /* Get the data associated with this top-level node */
01543     data = dds->data;
01544     if(data == NULL) return OC_EINVAL;
01545     return oc_data_read(link,data,start,edges,memsize,memory);
01546 }

01614 OCerror
01615 oc_dds_readn(OCobject link, OCobject ddsnode,
01616                  size_t* start, size_t N,
01617              size_t memsize, void* memory)
01618 {

01623     OCDEREF(OCnode*,dds,ddsnode);

01625     /* Get the data associated with this top-level node */
01626     data = dds->data;
01627     if(data == NULL) return OC_EINVAL;
01628     return oc_data_readn(link,data,start,N,memsize,memory);

01761 /* Insert client parameter
01762    return value:
01763     OC_NOERR => not already define; insertion performed
01764     OC_EINVAL => already defined
01765 */
01766 OCerror
01767 oc_clientparam_insert(OCobject link, const char* param, const char* value)
01768 {
01769     OCstate* state;
01770     OCVERIFY(OC_State,link);
01771     OCDEREF(OCstate*,state,link);
01772 
01773     state->clientparams = dapparaminsert(state->clientparams,param,value);
01774     return OC_NOERR;
01775 }

01778    return value:

01780     OC_EINVAL => not already defined
01781 */

01831 /**************************************************/
01832 /* New 10/31/2009: return the size(in bytes)
01833    of the fetched datadds.
01834 */
01835 
01848 OCerror
01849 oc_raw_xdrsize(OCobject link, OCobject ddsroot, off_t* xdrsizep)
01850 {
01851     OCnode* root;
01852     OCVERIFY(OC_Node,ddsroot);
01853     OCDEREF(OCnode*,root,ddsroot);
01854 
01855     if(root->root == NULL || root->root->tree == NULL
01856     || root->root->tree->dxdclass != OCDATADDS)
01857         return OCTHROW(OC_EINVAL);
01858     if(xdrsizep) *xdrsizep = root->root->tree->data.datasize;
01859     return OC_NOERR;
01860 }

01873 oc_get_lastmodified_data(OCobject link)

01881 /* Given an arbitrary OCnode, return the connection of which it is a part */
01882 OCerror
01883 oc_get_connection(OCobject ddsnode, OCobject* linkp)
01884 {
01885     OCnode* node;
01886     OCVERIFY(OC_Node,ddsnode);
01887     OCDEREF(OCnode*,node,ddsnode);
01888     if(linkp) *linkp = node->root->tree->state;
01889     return OC_NOERR;
01890 }

01952 oc_dds_dd(OCobject link, OCobject ddsroot, int level)

01957     OCDEREF(OCstate*,state,link);
01958     OCVERIFY(OC_Node,ddsroot);

01976 OCerror
01977 oc_data_ddpath(OCobject link, OCobject datanode, char** resultp)
01978 {
01979     OCstate* state;
01980     OCdata* data;
01981     OCbytes* buffer;
01982 
01983     OCVERIFY(OC_State,link);
01984     OCDEREF(OCstate*,state,link);
01985     OCVERIFY(OC_Data,datanode);
01986     OCDEREF(OCdata*,data,datanode);
01987 
01988     buffer = ocbytesnew();
01989     ocdumpdatapath(state,data,buffer);
01990     if(resultp) *resultp = ocbytesdup(buffer);
01991     ocbytesfree(buffer);
01992     return OC_NOERR;
01993 }
01994 
01995 OCerror
01996 oc_data_ddtree(OCobject link, OCobject ddsroot)
01997 {
01998     OCstate* state;
01999     OCdata* data;
02000     OCbytes* buffer;
02001     OCVERIFY(OC_State,link);
02002     OCDEREF(OCstate*,state,link);
02003     OCVERIFY(OC_Data,ddsroot);
02004     OCDEREF(OCdata*,data,ddsroot);
02005 
02006     buffer = ocbytesnew();
02007     ocdumpdatatree(state,data,buffer,0);
02008     fprintf(stderr,"%s\n",ocbytescontents(buffer));
02009     ocbytesfree(buffer);
02010     return OC_NOERR;
02011 }
